attributes.action: should england, wales and n ireland have a vote in a referendum that we should say good bye to scotland
attributes.additional_details:
It is only politicians who are against Scotland leaving the UK, many of us will be quite happy for them to go. Are we not also entitled to a vote on the subject, do we want them is the question?

The experience of many of us is they do not care much for us anyway, who do they support in any sport? Not us!
